pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adsorption Isotherm Models // Model adsorption behavior using classical isotherms, including Langmuir, Freundlich, BrunauerEmmettTeller (BET), and Temkin models. The package supports parameter estimation through both linearized and non- linear fitting techniques and generates high-quality plots for model diagnostics. It is intended for environmental scientists, chemists, and researchers working on adsorption phenomena in soils, water treatment, and material sciences. Functions are compatible with base 'R' and 'ggplot2' for visualization.
